name: Sweet Dreams (DEMO)
description:
VERY short demo rushed out in 4 days. Game made in Unity. Models made with MagicaVoxel. 

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • Spacebar: Interact

There have been incidents of people going into comas and getting trapped in their own nightmares! Play as Veronica, a girl who has the power to enter dreams- and nightmares, and save them from despair!
